issue.title: Basket : perimeter area should apear in title
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

It was decided with #643 to put the surface/area of selected perimeter in the perimeter section title (and not at the side of the map).
See #643 mockups.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This one has been done with #943.
No code to merge. Target is 4.3.2 .
